definition[0]: an instrument that measures changes in the air pressure and the weather, or that calculates height above sea level
definition[1]: something that shows any changes that are happening in a particular situation
example[0]: The skin is an accurate barometer of emotional and physical health.
definition[2]: if something is a barometer of the economy, it gives important information about the condition of the economy as a whole
example[1]: The growth in demand for electricity is one of the most accurate barometers of the economy.
